mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_CRS_CRT_BSI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, SUB_REPORT_TYPE, SUB_REPORT_TYPE_COST, TREAT_RESULT, TREAT_ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MESSAGE, CREDITCARD_COUNT, CREDITCARD_USING_COUNT, CREDITCARD_FIRST_OPEN, CA_COUNT, CP_OVERDRAFT_AMOUNT, C_OVERDRAFT_AMOUNT, CO_LAST_OCCUR_AMOUNT, HIGHEST_OVERDRAFT_AMOUNT, WORST_CARD_STATUS, LOAN_COUNT, LOAN_BANK_COUNT, LOAN_NOT_SQUARE_COUNT, LOAN_FIRST_OPEN, LOAN_ABNORMAL_COUNT, LOAN_AMOUNT, LOAN_BALANCE_AMOUNT, LOAN_ARREAR_AMOUNT, LOAN_HISTORY_ARREAR_TIMES, WORST_LOAN_STATUS, LOAN_HISTORY12_ARREAR_TIMES, CREDITCARD_CANCEL_COUNT, SETTLE_ACCOUNT_COUNT, YEAR5OVER_DUE_ACCOUNT_COUNT, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{subReportType}, #{subReportTypeCost}, #{treatResult}, #{treatErrorCode}, #{errorMessage}, #{creditcardCount}, #{creditcardUsingCount}, #{creditcardFirstOpen}, #{caCount}, #{cpOverdraftAmount}, #{cOverdraftAmount}, #{coLastOccurAmount}, #{highestOverdraftAmount}, #{worstCardStatus}, #{loanCount}, #{loanBankCount}, #{loanNotSquareCount}, #{loanFirstOpen}, #{loanAbnormalCount}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanBalanceAmount}, #{loanArrearAmount}, #{loanHistoryArrearTimes}, #{worstLoanStatus}, #{loanHistory12ArrearTimes}, #{creditcardCancelCount}, #{settleAccountCount}, #{year5overDueAccountCount}, #{appId} )
